I have moved all the buses added to the other thread in the last week to this list, looking through both 2 lists there are only 27 buses duplicated, that means on the other thread there were another 86 to add to this, although I guess some of those will have changed hands so I really don't think they are worth adding.
Please can you now list them by age!
Well I'm 24th in the list of age, providing the other 61's are post feb manufacture!

And I think I am the first post Barndoor '55 ?
